//the 2 areas that should require an item to pass are:
//3001, 30, 17 - object 12668
//3001, 31, 17 - object 12669
//3014, 17, 19 - object 12668
//3014, 18, 19 - object 12669

//jade citadel monster 592 or 631
//if monster is 592 boss could be 631, or 1038
//jade catacombs monster 1842, boss 1991

//the exit warp from citadel and catacombs go to
//the left and right side of map 3000 entrance
//areas marked with triangles pointing at a square.

//item suggestion for citadel boss drop:
//(100% chance, like a rune for pre-gruzar)
//item ID 2013 dye 29 "Jade Dragon Eye"
//allows them to pass the 2 portals and enter
//the jade catacombs.
//also: completing the daily quest for citadel 
//has a 14.3% chance to grant this item.

//another suggestion for a rare item:
//eventually you will need something like these so
//people have something rare to hunt for and sell :P
//
//"Lassic's Revenge" (a reference to the boss from the original version of the dungeon)
//item id 896
//sword id 58
//damage: 570-750
//dura 250,000
//non-bonded, no stats or hit/dam
//non-repairable, breaks on death.
//no power level requirements (or any requirements)
//this item is never +5-25 just normal quality*
// 1/200,000 drop chance from regular citadel and catacombs enemies
